CRW_Birta |guid = 71809218-576d-4e0f-89e4-d208e7b8af13 }} '''Birta''' is an [Ogre](/ogre/) and a recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background An ogre cook working for [Fyrna](/fyrna/) at [The Hole](/theHole/), Birta is particularly unhappy with her employer, citing the Gullet's poor smell, small beds, imps attacking her dreadlocks, and getting only one day off per month. But since she's chained to the stove, she's not exactly in a position to complain much. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = |crew = * {{crewrank|1|helmsman}} * {{crewrank|1|cook}} * Personality: Fearless, Impulsive, Wilder * {{cp2|450}} to hire * Consumes 2 units of water and food per day. }} ## Gallery Portrait_Birta_sm.png | Birta's crew portrait [Category:The Gullet characters](/categoryTheGulletCharacters/) [Category:The Hole characters](/categoryTheHoleCharacters/) {{Crew navbar PoE2}}
